plot: Inspired by true story of a nun Jelena Karavayeva that follows last hours of life of a member of the French Resestance during the WW2, in the Sante prison, in Paris. Talks between nun and her will, before rooster's crow, decide their fate.
title: Nakon Sto je Petao Zapojao
plot_es: Inspired by true story of a nun Jelena Karavayeva that follows last hours of life of a member of the French Resestance during the WW2, in the Sante prison, in Paris. Talks between nun and her will, before rooster's crow, decide their fate.
